summary.span: 命名空间提供一些类，您可以使用这些类连接到、监视和管理网络上的消息队列，并发送、接收或查看消息。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that allow you to connect to, monitor, and administer message queues on the network and send, receive, or peek messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员类包含用于读取和写入到队列的消息的以下方法：Members of the class include the following methods for reading and writing messages to the queue: - 方法使应用程序将消息写入到队列。The method enables your application to write messages to the queue. 该方法的重载，可以指定是否将发送消息 using （它提供了具体控制你发送的信息） 或任何其他托管的对象，包括特定于应用程序的类。Overloads of the method enable you to specify whether to send your message using a (which provides detailed control over the information you send) or any other managed object, including application-specific classes. 作为事务的一部分，该方法还支持发送消息。The method also supports sending messages as part of a transaction. - ， ，和方法提供了用于从队列中读取消息的功能。The , , and methods provide functionality for reading messages from a queue. 如方法，这些方法提供重载，以支持事务的队列处理。Like the method, these methods provide overloads that support transactional queue processing. 这些方法还提供了超时时间的重载。These methods also provide overloads with time-out. Out 参数，使处理继续队列是否为空。Out parameters that enable processing to continue if the queue is empty. 因为这些方法是同步处理的示例，它们将中断当前线程，直到可用消息，则除非您指定了超时。Because these methods are examples of synchronous processing, they interrupt the current thread until a message is available, unless you specify a time-out. - 方法类似于是，但它不会导致要读取它时从队列中移除的消息。The method is similar to , but it does not cause a message to be removed from the queue when it is read. 因为不会更改队列内容中，没有重载以支持事务处理。Because does not change the queue contents, there are no overloads to support transactional processing. 但是，因为、 like ，以同步方式从队列中读取消息，该方法的重载确实支持才能防止线程无限期地等待指定超时。However, because , like , reads messages synchronously from the queue, overloads of the method do support specifying a time-out in order to prevent the thread from waiting indefinitely. - ， ， ，和方法提供方法以异步方式从队列中读取消息。The , , , and methods provide ways to asynchronously read messages from the queue. 它们不会在等待消息到达队列中时中断当前线程。They do not interrupt the current thread while waiting for a message to arrive in the queue. 以下的方法类提供用于按指定的条件检索队列的列表和确定是否存在特定的队列的功能：The following methods of the class provide functionality for retrieving lists of queues by specified criteria and determining if specific queues exist: - 允许检索的专用队列的计算机上。 enables the retrieval of the private queues on a computer. - ，和提供检索由通用准则的公用队列的方法。, , and provide ways to retrieve public queues by common criteria. 重载提供甚至更细致地选择基于大量的搜索条件的队列。An overload of provides even finer detail for selecting queues based on a number of search criteria. 其他方法类提供了以下功能：Other methods of the class provide the following functionality: - 创建和删除消息队列队列。Creating and deleting Message Queueing queues. - 使用消息枚举器来单步执行队列中的消息。Using a message enumerator to step through the messages in a queue. - 用于循环访问系统上的队列的队列枚举器。Using a queue enumerator for iterating through the queues on the system. - 设置基于 ACL 的访问权限。Setting ACL-based access rights. - 如何使用连接缓存。Working with the connection cache. 类提供了详细的控制的信息发送到队列，并且该对象使用接收或查看从队列消息时。The class provides detailed control over the information you send to a queue, and is the object used when receiving or peeking messages from a queue. 消息正文的属性除了类包括确认设置、 格式化程序选择、 标识、 身份验证和加密的信息、 时间戳、 有关使用跟踪，服务器日志记录，指示和死信队列和事务数据。Besides the message body, the properties of the class include acknowledgment settings, formatter selection, identification, authentication and encryption information, timestamps, indications about using tracing, server journaling, and dead-letter queues, and transaction data. 组件是与以下三个格式化程序，使您能够序列化和反序列化消息从队列发送和接收相关联：The component is associated with the following three formatters, which enable you to serialize and deserialize messages sent and received from queues: - 提供松散耦合的消息传递，启用的客户端和服务器上的序列化类型的独立版本控制。The provides loosely coupled messaging, enabling independent versioning of serialized types on the client and server. - 与 MSMQ COM 控件兼容。The is compatible with the MSMQ COM control. 它允许你将发送可接收的控件的类型以及接收已由控件发送的类型。It allows you to send types that can be received by the control and to receive types that were sent by the control. - 提供一个更快的替代方法，但没有优点的松散耦合的消息传递。The provides a faster alternative to the , but without the benefit of loosely coupled messaging. 中的其他类`Messaging`命名空间支持代码访问和基于 ACL 的安全筛选时从队列中读取消息，以及使用事务时发送和接收消息的属性。Other classes in the `Messaging` namespace support code-access and ACL-based security, filtering properties when reading messages from a queue, and using transactions when sending and receiving messages.
